root.name: Workbooks
root.description: Toolbox to create and manipulate result tables with plug-ins and protocols, and export as text file or to your favorite spreadsheet software
root.author: adufour - Alexandre Dufour
root.changelog:
- Version 2.0.0.0 Date 2014-02-11 09:35:23
Improved graphical interface: - More responsive when refreshing - Columns can be hidden WorkbookToFile block: - Option to save as spreadsheet or text - Text file is now tab-delimited - Now accessible within scripts
- Version 1.0.0.1 Date 2013-01-28 12:59:12
Updated plugin classname
- Version 1.0.0.0 Date 2013-01-28 11:46:10
Cleaned project (renamed from POI) and fixed dependencies (EzPlug was missing)
- Version 0.0.1.0 Date 2013-01-11 17:39:01
